trans-unit.source: Provides access to an ordered, strongly typed collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: array是多維的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: -在來源中的項目數大於可用空間index到目的陣列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of items within this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個執行個體內的項目總數<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目總數。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref>想要使用的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index of value if found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 索引 value 如果集合中找到則為-1。

trans-unit.target: index不是有效的索引中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref>是同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所產生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to this collection is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此集合的存取會同步處理。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions that result from changes made by other threads.
